outputs.name: shd_par
outputs.description:
Shading Parameters that can be applied to a Dragonfly object
using the "DF Apply Facade Parameters" component.

inputs.name: _depth
inputs.description: A number for the overhang depth.

inputs.name: _angle_
inputs.description:
A number for the for an angle to rotate the overhang in degrees.
Default is 0 for no rotation.

name: DF Overhang Parameters
description:
Create Dragonfly shading parameters with instructions for a single overhang
(awning, balcony, etc.) over an entire wall.
-
